item.title: Home Fitness
item.dc:creator: sh-themes
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1460051705474{margin-top: -1px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1460051647262{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][layerslider_vc id="1" el_class="no-bottom-margin"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css=".vc_custom_1460051425943{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #4db6ac !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1437434015710{background-color: #4db6ac !important;}" el_class="text-center"][vc_empty_space height="60px"][vc_column_text]

DISCOVER YOUR POTENTIAL

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_separator color="white" el_width="50"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1437432137226{margin-right: 30px !important;margin-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

The physical postures of yoga are used to alleviate health problems, reduce stress and make the spine supple in contemporary times. Yoga is also used as a complete exercise program and physical therapy routine.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][sh_btn link="#" target="_self" size="extralarge" shape="round" color="rgba(255,255,255,0.01)" bordercolor="#ffffff" bordersize="1" fontcolor="#ffffff" icon="fa fa-glass"]Learn More[/sh_btn][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1460051303412{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="53" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1437434104196{margin-bottom: -7px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1437438645611{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1460051487563{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][shvc_colorbg backgroundcolor="#ffffff" fontcolor="#4db6ac" arrower="top"][vc_empty_space height="60px"][vc_column_text]

It is claimed that yoga can be an excellent training for children and adolescents, both as a form of physical exercise and for breathing, focus, mindfulness, and stress relief.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_separator color="custom" el_width="50" accent_color="#4db6ac"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/shvc_colorbg][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1437439276083{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1437439547162{margin-bottom: -7px !important;}"][shvc_colorbg backgroundcolor="#ffffff" fontcolor="#4db6ac" arrower="bottom"][vc_empty_space height="20px"][/shvc_colorbg][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css=".vc_custom_1437437745956{margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #4db6ac !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1460051322492{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="76" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1437438512607{margin-bottom: -7px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1437434015710{background-color: #4db6ac !important;}" el_class="text-center"][vc_empty_space height="60px"][vc_column_text]

HEALTHY DECISIONS

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_separator color="white" el_width="50"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1437432137226{margin-right: 30px !important;margin-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Yoga is used for treatment of cancer patients to decrease depression, insomnia, pain, and fatigue and to increase anxiety control.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][sh_btn link="#" target="_self" size="extralarge" shape="round" color="rgba(255,255,255,0.01)" bordercolor="#ffffff" bordersize="1" fontcolor="#ffffff" icon="fa fa-glass"]Learn More[/sh_btn][vc_empty_space][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1437438645611{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1460051516636{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][shvc_colorbg backgroundcolor="#ffffff" fontcolor="#4db6ac" arrower="top"][vc_empty_space height="60px"][vc_column_text]

The relaxation techniques incorporated in yoga can lessen chronic pain, such as lower back pain, arthritis, headaches and carpal tunnel syndrome.Â  Yoga can also lower blood pressure and reduce insomnia.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_separator color="custom" el_width="50" accent_color="#4db6ac"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/shvc_colorbg][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1437439276083{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1437439547162{margin-bottom: -7px !important;}"][shvc_colorbg backgroundcolor="#ffffff" fontcolor="#4db6ac" arrower="bottom"][vc_empty_space height="20px"][/shvc_colorbg][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css=".vc_custom_1437437745956{margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #4db6ac !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1437434015710{background-color: #4db6ac !important;}" el_class="text-center"][vc_empty_space height="60px"][vc_column_text]

MANAGE STRESS

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_separator color="white" el_width="50"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1437432137226{margin-right: 30px !important;margin-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Aside from the array of physical benefits, one of the best benefits of yoga is how it helps a person manage stress, which has been known to have devastating effects on the body and mind.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][sh_btn link="#" target="_self" size="extralarge" shape="round" color="rgba(255,255,255,0.01)" bordercolor="#ffffff" bordersize="1" fontcolor="#ffffff" icon="fa fa-glass"]Learn More[/sh_btn][vc_empty_space][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1460051344782{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="98" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1437505037416{margin-bottom: -7px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1437438645611{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1460051551603{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][shvc_colorbg backgroundcolor="#ffffff" fontcolor="#4db6ac" arrower="top"][vc_empty_space height="60px"][/shvc_colorbg][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Warm Up
item.dc:creator: sh-themes
item.content:encoded: Ideal for anyone new to yoga and interested in its benefits, this beginner level sequence will help you build strength, increase flexibility, and find focus. This class is practiced in a warm (room temperature) studio, moderately paced so you will learn the fundamental postures and principles that create a successful and effective yoga practice. Set to music, this class will invigorate you.

item.title: Yoga With Weights
item.dc:creator: sh-themes
item.content:encoded: A total body workout, these classes are set to energizing music and designed to tone and sculpt every major muscle group. This class complements your regular yoga practice while boosting your metabolism and pushing your strength and flexibility to new heights.

item.title: Level 2 Yoga
item.dc:creator: sh-themes
item.content:encoded: Ready to sweat? Level 2 Yoga is a rigorous yoga class with demanding strength postures that will have you moving, breathing and sweating! This class focuses on building and engaging your core strength to support you in more advanced postures.
